alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Hardin; Marshall; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:25PM CDT until July 13 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR MARSHALL...SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN...SOUTHERN TAMA AND SOUTHWESTERN GRUNDY COUNTIES... At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Le Grand, or 7 miles east of Marshalltown, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 815 AM, trained weather spotter reported quarter sized hail near Albion. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marshalltown, Toledo, Tama, Conrad, Meskwaki Casino, Gladbrook, Le Grand, Garwin, Gilman, Albion, Union, Liscomb, Montour, Laurel, New Providence, Beaman, Haverhill, Whitten, Ferguson and Green Mountain. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
